payload.pattern: Webhook delivery with retries and idempotency. Use exponential backoff for failed deliveries; store delivery attempts by webhook ID to ensure exactly-once processing; honor Retry-After when provided.

occurrences.context: retry failed webhook deliveries with backoff
circuit breaker when receiver is unhealthy

payload.applicability: Event-driven integrations (Stripe, GitHub, Slack) where receiver must process exactly-once
